channel.title: CNNs on Manoj Akondi
channel.description: Recent content in CNNs on Manoj Akondi

item.title: Covid Detection through CT scans
item.description: Covid is a dreadful infection which is hard to detect. So, we have tried to design a model which can predict Covid from CT scans. This assist radiologist and make their process much easier. The dataset was collected from various sources such as a open sourced github repo and from some hospitals. Since the data collected is pretty less, we have a model, BCD-Unet for segmentation of lungs on open sourced lung dataset in kaggle.
